description: Lists knowledge bases associated with an agent and information about each one.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent for which to return information about knowledge bases associated with it.

parameters.name: agentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the agent for which to return information about knowledge bases associated with it.

nested_items.name: agentKnowledgeBaseSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each of which contains information about a knowledge base associated with the agent.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the knowledge base associated with an agent.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base associated with an agent.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseState
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the agent uses the knowledge base or not when sending an InvokeAgent request.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the knowledge base associated with an agent was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
